mapper.insert: insert into warehousing (purchase_id, detailed_purchase_id, Warehousing_number, status, create_time) values (#{purchaseId}, #{detailedPurchaseId}, #{warehousingNumber}, #{status}, #{createTime});

insert into detailed_warehousing (warehousing_id, vendor_id, sku_id, batch, purchase_price, number, status, logic_del, create_time) values (#{warehousingId}, #{vendorId}, #{skuId}, #{batch}, #{purchasePrice}, #{number}, 0, 0, now());
mapper.update:
update warehousing
purchase_id= #{purchaseId},
detailed_purchase_id= #{detailedPurchaseId},
examine_user_id= #{examineUserId},
examine_time= #{examineTime},
Warehousing_user_id= #{warehousingUserId},
Warehousing_time= #{warehousingTime},
Warehousing_number= #{warehousingNumber},
status= #{status},
signing_details= #{signingDetails},
inventory_details= #{inventoryDetails},
where id = #{id}

update warehousing
examine_user_id = #{examineUserId},
examine_time = #{examineTime},
Warehousing_user_id = #{warehousingUserId},
Warehousing_time = #{warehousingTime},
Warehousing_number = #{warehousingNumber},
status = #{status},
renew_time = #{c},
signing_details = #{signingDetails},
inventory_details = #{inventoryDetails},
where id=#{id};

update detailed_warehousing
vendor_id = #{vendorId},
sku_id = #{skuId},
purchase_price = #{purchasePrice},
number = #{number},
status = #{status},
logic_del = #{logicDel},
where id = #{id};
mapper.select:
select w.id as w_id, w.purchase_id as w_purchase_id, w.detailed_purchase_id as w_detailed_purchase_id, w.examine_user_id as w_examine_user_id, w.examine_time as w_examine_time, w.Warehousing_user_id as w_Warehousing_user_id, w.Warehousing_time as w_Warehousing_time, w.Warehousing_number as w_Warehousing_number, w.status as w_status, w.create_user_id as w_create_user_id, w.create_time as w_create_time, w.user_renew_id as w_user_renew_id, w.renew_time as w_renew_time, w.signing_details as w_signing_details, w.inventory_details as w_inventory_details,
p.id as p_id, p.purchase_desc as p_purchase_desc, p.purchase_number as p_purchase_number, p.examine_user_id as p_examine_user_id, p.examine_time as p_examine_time, p.examine_opinion as p_examine_opinion, p.examine_status as p_status, p.create_user_id as p_create_user_id, p.create_time as p_create_time, p.user_renew_id as p_user_renew_id, p.renew_time as p_renew_time,
dp.id as dp_id, dp.purchase_id as dp_purchase_id, dp.vendor_id as dp_vendor_id, dp.sku_id as dp_sku_id, dp.batch as dp_batch, dp.purchase_price as dp_purchase_price, dp.number as dp_number, dp.status as dp_status, dp.create_user_id as dp_create_user_id, dp.create_time as dp_create_time, dp.user_renew_id as dp_user_renew_id, dp.renew_time as dp_renew_time,
e.id as e_id, e.role_id as e_role_id, e.username as e_username, e.password as e_password, e.address as e_address, e.phone as e_phone, e.create_user_id as e_create_user_id, e.create_time as e_create_time, e.user_renew_id as e_user_renew_id, e.renew_time as e_renew_time,
wa.id as wa_id, wa.role_id as wa_role_id, wa.username as wa_username, wa.password as wa_password, wa.address as wa_address, wa.phone as wa_phone, wa.create_user_id as wa_create_user_id, wa.create_time as wa_create_time, wa.user_renew_id as wa_user_renew_id, wa.renew_time as wa_renew_time,
sku.id as sku_id, sku.spu_id as sku_spu_id, sku.sku_name as sku_sku_name, sku.sku_desc as sku_sku_desc, sku.color_id as sku_color_id, sku.price_id as sku_price_id, sku.sales_volume as sku_sales_volume, sku.company_id as sku_company_id, sku.manufacturer as sku_manufacturer, sku.Supplier_id as sku_Supplier_id, sku.create_user_id as sku_create_user_id, sku.create_time as sku_create_time, sku.user_renewId as sku_user_renewId, sku.renew_time as sku_renew_time,
spu.id as spu_id, spu.good_name as spu_good_name, spu.brand as spu_brand, spu.sort_id as spu_sort_id, spu.status as spu_status, spu.create_user_id as spu_create_user_id, spu.create_time as spu_create_time, spu.user_renew_id as spu_user_renew_id, spu.renew_time as spu_renew_time, spu.con1 as spu_con1, spu.con2 as spu_con2, spu.con3 as spu_con3
from warehousing w left join purchase p on w.purchase_id = p.id left join detailed_purchase dp on w.detailed_purchase_id = dp.id left join user e on w.examine_user_id = e.id left join user wa on w.Warehousing_user_id = wa.id left join goodsku sku on dp.sku_id = sku.id left join goodspu spu on sku.spu_id = spu.id

select w.id as w_id, w.purchase_id as w_purchase_id, w.detailed_purchase_id as w_detailed_purchase_id, w.examine_user_id as w_examine_user_id, w.examine_time as w_examine_time, w.Warehousing_user_id as w_Warehousing_user_id, w.Warehousing_time as w_Warehousing_time, w.Warehousing_number as w_Warehousing_number, w.status as w_status, w.create_user_id as w_create_user_id, w.create_time as w_create_time, w.user_renew_id as w_user_renew_id, w.renew_time as w_renew_time, w.signing_details as w_signing_details, w.inventory_details as w_inventory_details,
p.id as p_id, p.purchase_desc as p_purchase_desc, p.purchase_number as p_purchase_number, p.examine_user_id as p_examine_user_id, p.examine_time as p_examine_time, p.examine_opinion as p_examine_opinion, p.examine_status as p_status, p.create_user_id as p_create_user_id, p.create_time as p_create_time, p.user_renew_id as p_user_renew_id, p.renew_time as p_renew_time,
dp.id as dp_id, dp.purchase_id as dp_purchase_id, dp.vendor_id as dp_vendor_id, dp.sku_id as dp_sku_id, dp.batch as dp_batch, dp.purchase_price as dp_purchase_price, dp.number as dp_number, dp.status as dp_status, dp.create_user_id as dp_create_user_id, dp.create_time as dp_create_time, dp.user_renew_id as dp_user_renew_id, dp.renew_time as dp_renew_time,
e.id as e_id, e.role_id as e_role_id, e.username as e_username, e.password as e_password, e.address as e_address, e.phone as e_phone, e.create_user_id as e_create_user_id, e.create_time as e_create_time, e.user_renew_id as e_user_renew_id, e.renew_time as e_renew_time,
wa.id as wa_id, wa.role_id as wa_role_id, wa.username as wa_username, wa.password as wa_password, wa.address as wa_address, wa.phone as wa_phone, wa.create_user_id as wa_create_user_id, wa.create_time as wa_create_time, wa.user_renew_id as wa_user_renew_id, wa.renew_time as wa_renew_time,
sku.id as sku_id, sku.spu_id as sku_spu_id, sku.sku_name as sku_sku_name, sku.sku_desc as sku_sku_desc, sku.color_id as sku_color_id, sku.price_id as sku_price_id, sku.sales_volume as sku_sales_volume, sku.company_id as sku_company_id, sku.manufacturer as sku_manufacturer, sku.Supplier_id as sku_Supplier_id, sku.create_user_id as sku_create_user_id, sku.create_time as sku_create_time, sku.user_renewId as sku_user_renewId, sku.renew_time as sku_renew_time,
spu.id as spu_id, spu.good_name as spu_good_name, spu.brand as spu_brand, spu.sort_id as spu_sort_id, spu.status as spu_status, spu.create_user_id as spu_create_user_id, spu.create_time as spu_create_time, spu.user_renew_id as spu_user_renew_id, spu.renew_time as spu_renew_time, spu.con1 as spu_con1, spu.con2 as spu_con2, spu.con3 as spu_con3
from warehousing w left join purchase p on w.purchase_id = p.id left join detailed_purchase dp on w.detailed_purchase_id = dp.id left join user e on w.examine_user_id = e.id left join user wa on w.Warehousing_user_id = wa.id left join goodsku sku on dp.sku_id = sku.id left join goodspu spu on sku.spu_id = spu.id where w.id = #{id}

select w.id as w_id, w.purchase_id as w_purchase_id, w.detailed_purchase_id as w_detailed_purchase_id, w.examine_user_id as w_examine_user_id, w.examine_time as w_examine_time, w.Warehousing_user_id as w_Warehousing_user_id, w.Warehousing_time as w_Warehousing_time, w.Warehousing_number as w_Warehousing_number, w.status as w_status, w.create_user_id as w_create_user_id, w.create_time as w_create_time, w.user_renew_id as w_user_renew_id, w.renew_time as w_renew_time, w.signing_details as w_signing_details, w.inventory_details as w_inventory_details,
p.id as p_id, p.purchase_desc as p_purchase_desc, p.purchase_number as p_purchase_number, p.examine_user_id as p_examine_user_id, p.examine_time as p_examine_time, p.examine_opinion as p_examine_opinion, p.examine_status as p_status, p.create_user_id as p_create_user_id, p.create_time as p_create_time, p.user_renew_id as p_user_renew_id, p.renew_time as p_renew_time,
dp.id as dp_id, dp.purchase_id as dp_purchase_id, dp.vendor_id as dp_vendor_id, dp.sku_id as dp_sku_id, dp.batch as dp_batch, dp.purchase_price as dp_purchase_price, dp.number as dp_number, dp.status as dp_status, dp.create_user_id as dp_create_user_id, dp.create_time as dp_create_time, dp.user_renew_id as dp_user_renew_id, dp.renew_time as dp_renew_time,
e.id as e_id, e.role_id as e_role_id, e.username as e_username, e.password as e_password, e.address as e_address, e.phone as e_phone, e.create_user_id as e_create_user_id, e.create_time as e_create_time, e.user_renew_id as e_user_renew_id, e.renew_time as e_renew_time,
wa.id as wa_id, wa.role_id as wa_role_id, wa.username as wa_username, wa.password as wa_password, wa.address as wa_address, wa.phone as wa_phone, wa.create_user_id as wa_create_user_id, wa.create_time as wa_create_time, wa.user_renew_id as wa_user_renew_id, wa.renew_time as wa_renew_time,
sku.id as sku_id, sku.spu_id as sku_spu_id, sku.sku_name as sku_sku_name, sku.sku_desc as sku_sku_desc, sku.color_id as sku_color_id, sku.price_id as sku_price_id, sku.sales_volume as sku_sales_volume, sku.company_id as sku_company_id, sku.manufacturer as sku_manufacturer, sku.Supplier_id as sku_Supplier_id, sku.create_user_id as sku_create_user_id, sku.create_time as sku_create_time, sku.user_renewId as sku_user_renewId, sku.renew_time as sku_renew_time,
spu.id as spu_id, spu.good_name as spu_good_name, spu.brand as spu_brand, spu.sort_id as spu_sort_id, spu.status as spu_status, spu.create_user_id as spu_create_user_id, spu.create_time as spu_create_time, spu.user_renew_id as spu_user_renew_id, spu.renew_time as spu_renew_time, spu.con1 as spu_con1, spu.con2 as spu_con2, spu.con3 as spu_con3
from warehousing w left join purchase p on w.purchase_id = p.id left join detailed_purchase dp on w.detailed_purchase_id = dp.id left join user e on w.examine_user_id = e.id left join user wa on w.Warehousing_user_id = wa.id left join goodsku sku on dp.sku_id = sku.id left join goodspu spu on sku.spu_id = spu.id
w.status = #{stu}
order by w.status;

select dw.id as dw_id, dw.warehousing_id as dw_warehousing_id, dw.vendor_id as dw_vendor_id, dw.sku_id as dw_sku_id, dw.batch as dw_batch, dw.purchase_price as dw_purchase_price, dw.number as dw_number, dw.status as dw_status, dw.logic_del as dw_logic_del, dw.create_user_id as dw_create_user_id, dw.create_time as dw_create_time, dw.user_renew_id as dw_user_renew_id, dw.renew_time as dw_renew_time,
w.id as w_id, w.purchase_id as w_purchase_id, w.detailed_purchase_id as w_detailed_purchase_id, w.examine_user_id as w_examine_user_id, w.examine_time as w_examine_time, w.Warehousing_user_id as w_Warehousing_user_id, w.Warehousing_time as w_Warehousing_time, w.Warehousing_number as w_Warehousing_number, w.status as w_status, w.create_user_id as w_create_user_id, w.create_time as w_create_time, w.user_renew_id as w_user_renew_id, w.renew_time as w_renew_time, w.signing_details as w_signing_details, w.inventory_details as w_inventory_details,
g.id as g_id, g.spu_id as g_spu_id, g.sku_name as g_sku_name, g.sku_desc as g_sku_desc, g.color_id as g_color_id, g.price_id as g_price_id, g.sales_volume as g_sales_volume, g.company_id as g_company_id, g.manufacturer as g_manufacturer, g.Supplier_id as g_Supplier_id, g.create_user_id as g_create_user_id, g.create_time as g_create_time, g.user_renewId as g_user_renewId, g.renew_time as g_renew_time, g.logic_status as g_logic_status,
c.id as c_id, c.color_name as c_color_name, c.create_user_id as c_create_user_id, c.create_time as c_create_time, c.user_renew_id as c_user_renew_id, c.renew_time as c_renew_time,
v.id as v_id, v.vendor_name as v_vendor_name, v.sku_id as v_sku_id, v.vendor_address as v_vendor_address, v.desc as v_desc, v.principal as v_principal, v.tel as v_tel, v.create_user_id as v_create_user_id, v.create_time as v_create_time, v.user_renew_id as v_user_renew_id, v.renew_time as v_renew_time, v.purchase_time as v_purchase_time
from detailed_warehousing dw left join warehousing w on dw.warehousing_id = w.id left join vendor v on dw.vendor_id = v.id left join goodsku g on dw.sku_id = g.id left join color c on g.color_id = c.id where dw.warehousing_id = #{warehousingId};
